name: Habit Loop Mapping
description: A systematic approach to understanding and changing habits by identifying the cue-routine-reward cycle and developing replacement strategies.

target_behavior.title: What behavior is being addressed?
target_behavior.description: Define the specific habit or behavior to be mapped

habit_triggers.title: What triggers this habit? When/where does it occur?
habit_triggers.description: Identify the cues or triggers that initiate the habit

habit_routine.title: What is the specific behavior or sequence followed?
habit_routine.description: Map out the exact routine or behavior pattern

habit_reward.title: What payoff is gained from this habit?
habit_reward.description: Identify the reward or benefit obtained from the habit

replacement_strategy.title: What new routine can replace the old one with similar reward?
replacement_strategy.description: Develop a healthier routine that provides similar rewards

progress_tracking.title: Track attempts and consistency of new routine
progress_tracking.description: Monitor progress in implementing the new habit routine

change_outcomes.title: Results of habit change
change_outcomes.description: Record the outcomes and insights from the habit change process
